author: Minecraft
description: Mounts of Mayhem charges into Minecraft today! Face down undead foes in frenzied mounted combat during the day, at night, and even deep underwater. Fight back with the spear – a new tiered weapon which deals damage based on your precision and the speed of your trusted steed. Riders of the Overworld – mount up and lead the charge! The Mounts of Mayhem drop is out now in Minecraft!
title: PLAY MOUNTS OF MAYHEM TODAY!
